answers.answer: I felt like this when I first started my second trimester. But now that I'm 5 weeks into it, all my symptoms are gone and I feel great :). Don't get discouraged. Every pregnancy is different. Just take it one day at a time and it'll be over before you know it.

question: Are any of you having more of the pg symptoms (nausea, fatigue, headaches and such) that normally show up in the first? I feel like I had it so easy the first but now I hate to eat cause I get so sick every time and doesn't help I have to eat on a schedule to keep my diabetes controlled. And I thought the energy was supposed to come back? ! Lol I am so much more tired now than I was before. I feel so backwards, my first two were the other way around.
title: symptoms in second
